summary: A serial killer attacks a commercial artist which leaves her with amnesia and then becomes her neighbor.
cast: Jennie Garth|Currie Graham|Costas Mandylor|Peter Outerbridge|Eugene Clark|Helen Shaver|Billy Dee Williams|Walter Alza|Warren Dexter Beatty|Laura Catalano|Gordon Currie|Lucy Filippone|Kimberly Huie|Paul Molitor|Anne Pellett|Gerry Quigley|Rino Romano|Pj Torokvei|Kay Trembley|Mung-Ling Tsui|Chandra West|Tony Kaan
title: Asesino sin tregua
